article.title: Rich Client Tutorial Part 3
article.description: The Rich Client Platform (RCP) lets you reuse common functionality from the Eclipse IDE for use in your own applications. Parts 1 and 2 of this tutorial introduced you to the platform with a very simple example that did nothing but open a blank window. Part 3 discusses a more complicated example with menus, views, and other features. This part has been updated for Eclipse 3.1.2.
